fullplot: Errol Morris examines the incidents of abuse and torture of suspected terrorists at the hands of U.S. forces at the Abu Ghraib prison.
plot: Errol Morris examines the incidents of abuse and torture of suspected terrorists at the hands of U.S. forces at the Abu Ghraib prison.
title: Standard Operating Procedure

tomatoes.consensus: Well researched and finely crafted, Standard Operating Procedure is another gem from master documentarian Errol Morris.
